attributes.action: End Discrimination and Ensure Equal Treatment for All Nationalities
attributes.additional_details:
Equal Rights and Protection: We urge the government to ensure that all, regardless of nationality, are treated equitably under UK law. 
This includes fair and transparent processes for residency and protection.
Conduct a comprehensive review of current immigration policies to eliminate any form of bias or discrimination and establish safeguards to uphold equality for all.
attributes.background: In R (on the application of LR (Afghanistan)) v SSHD (Ukrainian Family Scheme—discrimination, nationality) [2024] UKUT 00236 (IAC), the court ruled that refusing his application for failing to meet the requirement to be a Ukrainian national was direct discrimination on the grounds of nationality.
